solution_line_template: He has {reading_hours} hours to read because {total_free_hours} - {movie1_duration} - {movie2_duration} = <<{total_free_hours}-{movie1_duration}-{movie2_duration}={reading_hours}>>{reading_hours}
He has {reading_minutes} minutes to read because {reading_hours} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{reading_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={reading_minutes}>>{reading_minutes}
He can read {words_read} words because {reading_minutes} x {reading_rate} = <<{reading_minutes}*{reading_rate}={words_read}>>{words_read}
